subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Hall of Famers lined the Pittsburgh Steelers’ sideline last night, with Terry Bradshaw, Mean Joe Greene, Jack Ham, Mel Blount and Franco Harris out front. The Baltimore Ravens probably thought they were playing all of them — and the current Steelers, too.
